title: ssh: tests fail on FreeBSD builder
body:
See an example build log from a FreeBSD builder:
http://build.golang.org/log/d6d9ae63de1b078b18d8cc848b107e057a360ccb

The issue seems to be that the test fails and the subprocess dies with an empty stderr.
Or more likely, the sshd failed to start for some reason. The existing diagnostics make
these cases difficult to distinguish.
